config_name: Binary Frequency - 8-hour eating window 5 of 7 days

configuration_json.formula: if (days_meeting_window >= required_days) then success_value else failure_value

schema.description: SC-BINARY-FREQUENCY: Success requires staying within 8-hour eating window on at least 5 of 7 days per week

metadata.recommendation_text: On at least 5 days per week, keep all eating within an 8-hour window (e.g., first meal at 10am, last meal by 6pm)

analysis.reasoning: SC-BINARY-FREQUENCY: Time-restricted eating is binary (within window or not) with weekly frequency pattern
